posts.post_title: FS/ N28 John Ward PSA4 (MK) REDUCED!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jerry
I've had this card for 15 yrs and just had it graded. It came back PSA4 with MK Qualifier. I'm not sure why the qualifier except it may have some faded mark ? on back between oarsmen and rifle shooters list. If it is, its hard to see and not obtrusive at all. The front is very clean and evenly rounded corners with NO creases.
Reduced to 575.00 shipped and Insured
Thanks for looking
Jerry
